page.title: 09NEWDIGATE CHURCH
page.content: The ancient church of St. Peter,Newdigate,is a bridge from the past;it's sole purpose is to witness to revelation of the Living God through Jesus Christ.The same faith that inspired its builders enlightens true worshippers today.The ancient shell remains intactbut the inside has been altered many times as ecclesiastical fashions changed.The present century has witnessed changes in services and modes of presentation. The reason for this is that we at St.Peter's Church,endeavour to practice the priesthood of all believers,allowing various spiritual gifts to be used for the benefit of all. There is a lively spirit in the services,varying,which provides a richness that is denied by repetition of the same thing week by week.
